original_text: I am writing this letter to you, my friends who are like my little children. I am writing to you because I do not want you to do wrong things. But if anyone among you does something wrong, there is someone who will speak to God on our behalf. That person is Jesus Christ, who always does only what is right. He will ask our Father God to forgive you. John 1 John 3
korean_text: 나의 자녀들아 내가 이것을 너희에게 씀은 너희로 죄를 범하지 않게 하려 함이라 만일 누가 죄를 범하여도 아버지 앞에서 우리에게 대언자가 있으니 곧 의로우신 예수 그리스도시라

sentences.original_text: I am writing this letter to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 이 편지를 쓰고 있노라

sentences.original_text: my friends who are like my little children
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 어린 아이들 같은 내 친구들아

sentences.original_text: I am writing to you because I do not want you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 쓰는 것은 너희가 죄를 짓지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: But if anyone among us does something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리 중에 누가 죄를 짓더라도

sentences.original_text: there is someone who will speak to God on our behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 우리를 위해 하나님께 말씀해 주시는 이가 있으니

sentences.original_text: who always does only what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 항상 의로운 일만 행하시는 분이시다

sentences.original_text: He will ask our Father God to forgive you
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리 아버지 하나님께 너희를 용서해 달라고 구하실 것이다
